channel.title: RAGE-SCAPE!Where noobs become legends/Need staff/New version :)
channel.description:
Hello, We are a project that I and my friend have been working on, we are a 24/7 server vps hosted, we have been working on this project for a few weeks off and on, and we are ready to build our players! Actually it's a customs server!Customs items, Custom npc(pikachus,spongbob) We have good friendly staff that do their jobs correctly and never abuse or ask for passwords! link for client: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/muitvll51r5wsr2/rage-scape.jar Current Forums: http://rage-scape.enjin.com/
Server Features: All Skills working (Hunter, Summoning,Dungeoneering) 100% Working Emotes, including skillcapes! Easy Money Making Not to hard and not to easy xp rates with double xp weekends! Bosses Include, King BLack Dragon Tormented Demons Minigames Include: Pest Controll Duel Arena Warrior's Guild Barrow's (UnderGround) Great Pking Place's Mage Bank Varrock PK (Multi) Lava Crossing Edgeville Green Dragons Funpk Nex Armour All Special attacks working! Downloadable Client Working!! New customs!! Hope to see some of you there!
Here are some Pictures:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2qmd7ur.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/sdn290.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/f1fqbs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2hwhe0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2u95mpk.png[/img]

Hello, We are a project that I and my friend have been working on, we are a 24/7 server vps hosted,
we have been working on this project for a few weeks off and on, and we are ready to build our players!
Actually it’s a customs server!Customs items, Custom npc(pikachus,spongbob)
We have good friendly staff that do their jobs correctly and never abuse or ask for passwords!
